name: PUKE SIMULATOR
description: Have you ever wanted to puke on people but were too shy to just go for it? But now we have you "covered". It's time to puke on people and anywhere you please. PUKE THEM ALL!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 or better Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes, please.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 or better Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes, pretty please.
